title.narrative: Health Pooled Fund III - Managed Fund

description.narrative: This activity (Health Pooled Fund III - Managed Fund) is a component of South Sudan Health Pooled Fund Phase III reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £108,036,834. This component benefits South Sudan, and works in the following sector(s): Health education, Reproductive health care, Basic health care, Malaria control. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Bank. The start date is 25-10-2018 and the end date is 30-09-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
